#summary Technical infrastructure for the project.

= Maven =

The project is built with Maven2.

  * [http://opencookbook.googlecode.com/files/BetterBuildsWithMaven.pdf Better Builds with Maven] - a nice book on Maven.

= Subversion =

Source code is managed via Subversion.

Generated code is excluded from SVN. This means that all the {{{**/target}}} directories must be excluded by default.
Exclusion is done by adding directory name to the {{{svn:ignore}}} property.

= Eclipse =

Primary IDE is Eclipse.

== Code style ==

Please use the following [http://opencookbook.googlecode.com/files/codestyle.xml code style] for Eclipse.

== Subversion for Eclipse ==

  * [http://subclipse.tigris.org Subclipse] - Eclipse plugin for Subversion.

== Maven2 for Eclipse ==

  * [http://m2eclipse.codehaus.org/ The Maven Integration for Eclipse] - Eclipse plugin for Maven2.
